@graph.definition: The harden tactic is used to increase the opportunity cost of computer network exploitation. Hardening differs from Detection in that it generally is conducted before a system is online and operational.
@graph.rdfs:label: Harden

d3f:Harden.definition: The harden tactic is used to increase the opportunity cost of computer network exploitation. Hardening differs from Detection in that it generally is conducted before a system is online and operational.
d3f:Harden.rdfs:label: Harden
